title: SCOR MTB fire out two (four) new Swiss Mountain Bikes, the 4060 and 4060 Z eMTB
content:
SCOR are a new Swiss mountain bike brand, developed over the last three years by a team of engineers and riders from BMC. The brand who now sit within the BMC Group are launching with two (OK, four) mountain bikes in 2021; the SCOR 4060 and the SCOR 4060 Z eMTB. Adjustable rear wheel travel

The post SCOR MTB fire out two (four) new Swiss Mountain Bikes, the 4060 and 4060 Z eMTB appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
